1.0.name: wordpress/spip-import
1.0.description: You want to quit Spip. Fine. This plug-in nanage blog posts and comments (not the tags and images). You have to edit the code to enter your database account and fill the categories conversion array. It's a prototype use to convert http://novovision.fr
